transcript:
Executive: Hi, if you record your name and reason for calling, I'll see if this person is
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir, Anshika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan beta. Bataiye.
Executive: Sir aapko call aaya hua tha.
Customer: Hello galti se lag gaya tha madam main to steel bech raha tha.
Executive: Accha accha baki aapka video meeting ho gaya tha sir sara kuch.
Customer: Unhone explain kar diya tha aapko. Main matlab wo matlab buyer seller wale to aa gaya main to khud hi bech raha tha.
Executive: Accha accha accha. Aapke taraf se mere ko message mila tha seller uska seller wala aa gaya hoga kuch aapki taraf se to main sa lead aagyi leke to main dekh raha tha.
Executive: Accha accha koi baat nahi sir. Baki sir video meeting aapki ho gayi thi na Poonam ji ke sath mein.
Customer: Haan ho gayi, ho gayi, ho gayi.
Executive: Sara kuch samajh mein aa gaya kahi pe agar aapko doubt lage to aap dobara se matlab mera number hai main WhatsApp pe aapko connect kiya hua hai aap mujhe ek baar message kar denge to main dobara connect kar lungi aapko.
Customer: Haan haan haan ek matlab ek lead aayi hai abhi mere ko.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Dekhta hu call karke unse baat kar leta hu. Kya hai sir ye.
Executive: Thik hai, thik hai sir aap baat kar lijiye aur aapko kuch bhi agar kahi pe bhi doubt lage to aap mujhe ek baar message kar dijiyega.
Customer: Kuch nahi ho payega madam ye side abhi to main thoda sa kam hi chal kho pa raha hai ye ek do din mein dekh lunga par nikal aaya karega kuch na kuch to business nikalega.
Executive: Accha accha thik hai aap dekh lijiye sir koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Baki sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call by mistake.

- Customer is facing issues with the site.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed video meeting was completed.

- Executive offered assistance via WhatsApp for doubts.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the site in a day or two.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meeting, assistance
